react19.title: React 19 & Rendering Model
react19.desc:
The project is built on React 19, leveraging the latest improvements in rendering and performance optimization.
Components are designed to be stateless whenever possible, reducing dependencies and improving reusability.

vite.title: Vite & Tooling
vite.desc:
The application uses Vite as its bundler, significantly improving startup time and developer experience.
The project structure is clear, supports fast hot reload, and is easy to scale with new features.

typescript.title: TypeScript & Type Safety
typescript.desc:
TypeScript is used throughout the project to ensure strong type safety.
Interfaces and types are carefully designed to minimize runtime errors and make future refactoring easier.

realtime.title: Realtime Data & WebSocket
realtime.desc:
Market data and trading states are updated in real time via WebSocket.
The data flow is carefully controlled to avoid unnecessary updates and ensure smooth UI performance.

backend.title: Backend & Node.js
backend.desc:
The realtime server is built with Node.js.
It focuses on simulating market data flows and supporting frontend development and demonstration.

codeOrg.title: Code Organization
codeOrg.desc:
The codebase is organized to be clean, readable, and easy to maintain.
UI, business logic, and configuration are clearly separated to support future scalability.
